name: Project SR-3076
description:
In the year 3076, humans have mastered bio-chemical engineering in order to produce what is known as "super-humans": humans with enhanced cognitive abilities and reflexes.

You are one of these super-humans and are subject to a lifelike simulation that will test your reflexes and ability to make quick decisions, driving a car at an insane speed in a dangerous environment.

In this procedurally-generated environment, you will have to master car controls, as obstacles will be more and more difficult to avoid.

Will you get out alive ? Will you see the end ? Only time will tell...

Project-SR3076 is a very cool arcade game, inspired by the best of the 80's: get ready for synthwave vibes and Tron-like neons, and try to make it to the top of highscores !

This game was made by a team of french students from Concordia University (Montreal, Canada). It was made in 2 months.

The game is either available as a single setup executable or as a ZIP.

The setup will guide you through installation steps. It is the recommended option.

The ZIP folder, if you prefer, contains the necessary files to run the game properly and without any installation on the PC.
